extension.name: Events Booking - Auto Group Members Generator
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This plugin generate group members automatically for a group registration. It can be used in case you don't want to collect group members information but still want to generate different PDF tickets for that group registration

field.name: default_enable_auto_group_members
field.label: Default Auto Generate Group Members Value
field.description: Set default value for Auto Generate Group Members for new event

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show On Frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend event submission form
